topic.title: Linkus Event Settings
topic.shortdesc: To get informed of Linkus events, you can enable notification of Linkus related events and allow the PBX to record the Linkus events.

section.title: Linkus Event Settings
section.p: Go to Settings Event Center Event Settings Operation , decide which Linkus event will be recorded in the Event Log and which Linkus event notification you will receive.

body.p: If the Record function is enabled for a Linkus event, when the Linkus event occurs, the log will be recorded.
To view the Linkus event logs:

ol.li: Go to Settings Event Center Event Log .
From the Event Name drop-down list, select a Linkus event.
Select the time period, click Search.
